law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a license or an exemption certificate expires ...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a license or an exemption certificate expires on the first May 31 after its effective date.

A Class "G-Temporary" license expires on the earlier of:
termination of the contract for which the license was issued; or
the first May 31 after its effective date.
